snippet.title: Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on a groundbreaking time travel adventure, completely re-imagined for the next generation of VR. Experience history like never before as you step back in time to rewrite the events of the past and reshape the future. 

Wishlist on PlayStation: https://bit.ly/3p4vc6K
Wishlist on Steam: https://rb.gy/79jzf
────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Step into the unknown and embark on an epic, time travel adventure, completely re-imagined for the next generation of VR.

Introducing Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate, a remake of the award winning, critically acclaimed VR time travel adventure game - Wanderer. Leave your passports at home, there’s no telling where you’ll go and who you’ll become as you venture back through the ages and unravel the mysteries of time. 

Walk in the footsteps of those who have gone before you, explore ages and events long lost to the hands of time as you find yourself thrust headfirst into thrilling stories from history in an adventure like no other. Discover rich worlds, encounter heart-pounding action and solve mind-bending puzzles as you rewrite the past to reshape the future.

A multitude of exciting new features and gameplay await keen adventurers. Filled with breath-taking new visuals, you can now swim, jump, crouch, climb, zipline and swing your way through time, in true adventure fashion. Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate is an unforgettable experience. Are you ready to take the (time) jump?
 
https://www.wanderervr.com/ 

────────────────────────────────────────────────────

Stay Updated: 
Discord -  https://discord.gg/Yd7e9ugQsd
Twitter - https://twitter.com/wanderervr
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/wanderervrgame
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@wanderervr?
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/wanderervr/
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/user/WandererVR
